mapper.sql: id , role_name, role_code, data_scope, menu_association_displayed, dept_association_displayed, delete_flag, sort, status, create_user_id, create_username, create_time, update_user_id, update_time, remark
mapper.select: select role_code from brc_sys_role sr left join brc_sys_user_role sur on sr.id = sur.role_id where sr.delete_flag = 0 and sur.user_id = #{userId}

select distinct bsr.id, bsr.role_code, bsr.role_name from brc_sys_role bsr left join brc_sys_user_role bsur on bsr.id = bsur.role_id left join brc_sys_user bsu on bsur.user_id = bsu.id where bsr.delete_flag = '0' and bsr.status = 1 and bsu.username = #{username}

select distinct bsr.id, bsr.role_code, bsr.role_name from brc_sys_role bsr left join brc_sys_user_role bsur on bsr.id = bsur.role_id left join brc_sys_user bsu on bsur.user_id = bsu.id where bsr.delete_flag = '0' and bsr.status = 1 and bsu.id = #{userId}
